feat.name: Barbed Hide
entries: One of your ancestors was a barbed devil or other spiky fiend. Barbs protrude from your head. You gain the following benefits:

items: As a bonus action, you can cause small barbs to protrude all over your body or cause them to retract. At the start of each of your turns while the barbs are out, you deal 1d6 piercing damage to any creature grappling you or any creature {@condition grappled} by you.
You gain proficiency in the {@skill Intimidation} skill. If you are already proficient in the skill, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.

feat.name: Bountiful Luck
entries: Whenever an ally you can see within 30 feet of you rolls a 1 on the d20 for an attack roll, an ability check, or a saving throw, you can use your reaction to let the ally reroll the die. The ally must use the new roll.

feat.name: Critter Friend
entries: Your friendship with animals mystically deepens. You gain the following benefits:

items: You gain proficiency in the {@skill Animal Handling} skill. If you are already proficient in the skill, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.

You learn the {@spell speak with animals} spell and can cast it at will, without expending a spell slot. You also learn the {@spell animal friendship} spell, and you can cast it once with this feat, without expending a spell slot. You regain the ability to cast it in this way when you finish a long rest. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

feat.name: Dragon Fear
entries: When angered, you radiate menace. You gain the following benefits:

items: Instead of exhaling destructive energy, you can roar and expend a use of your breath weapon to force each creature of your choice within 30 feet of you to make a Wisdom saving throw (DC 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Charisma modifier). A target automatically succeeds if it can't hear or see you. On a failed save, a target becomes {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. If the {@condition frightened} target takes any damage, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

feat.name: Dragon Hide
entries: You inherited the might and majesty of your dragon ancestors. You gain the following benefits:

items: You grow retractable claws from the tips of your fingers. Extending or retracting the claws requires no action. The claws are natural weapons, which you can use to make unarmed strikes. If you hit with them, you deal slashing damage equal to {@dice 1d4} + your Strength modifier, instead of the bludgeoning damage normal for an unarmed strike.
Your scales harden; you gain a +1 bonus to AC while you aren't wearing armor.

feat.name: Dragon Wings
entries: You sprout draconic wings. With your wings, you have a flying speed of 20 feet if you aren't wearing heavy armor and aren't exceeding your carrying capacity.

feat.name: Drow High Magic
entries: You learn more of the spells typical for your people. You learn {@spell detect magic} and can cast it at will, without expending a spell slot. You also learn {@spell levitate} and {@spell dispel magic}, each of which you can cast once without expending a spell slot. You regain the ability to cast the spell in this way when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

feat.name: Dwarf Resilience
entries: You have the blood of dwarf heroes flowing through your veins. You gain the following benefits:

items: Whenever you take the Dodge action in combat, you can spend one Hit Die to heal yourself. Roll the die, add your Constitution modifier, and regain a number of hit points equal to the total (minimum of 1).

feat.name: Elven Accuracy
entries: You have uncanny aim. You gain the following benefits:

items: Whenever you have advantage on an attack roll, you can reroll one of the dice once.

feat.name: Everybody's Friend
entries: You develop your magnetic personality to ease your way through the world. You gain the following benefits:

items: You gain proficiency in the {@skill Deception} and {@skill Persuasion} skills. If you're already proficient in either skill, your proficiency bonus is doubled for any check you make with that skill.

feat.name: Fade Away
entries: You can draw on your magical heritage to escape danger. You gain the following benefits:

items: When you take damage, you can use a reaction to magically become {@condition invisible} until the end of your next turn or until you attack, deal damage, or force someone to make a saving throw. Once you use this ability, you can't do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

feat.name: Fey Teleportation
entries: Drawing on your fey ancestry, you have learned how to teleport. You gain the following benefits:

items: You learn the {@spell misty step} spell and can cast it once without expending a spell slot. You regain the ability to cast it in this way when you finish a short or long rest. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for this spell.

feat.name: Flames of Phlegethos
entries: You learn to call on hellfire to serve your commands. You gain the following benefits:

items: When you roll fire damage for a spell you cast, you can reroll any roll of 1 on the fire damage dice, but you must use the new roll, even if it is another 1.

Whenever you cast a spell that deals fire damage, you can cause flames to wreathe you until the end of your next turn. The flames don't harm you or your possessions, and they shed bright light out to 30 feet and dim light for an additional 30 feet. While the flames are present, any creature within 5 feet of you that hits you with a melee attack takes 1d4 fire damage.

feat.name: Grudge-Bearer
entries: You have a deep hatred for a particular kind of creature. Choose your foes, a type of creature to bear the burden of your wrath: aberrations, beasts, celestials, constructs, dragons, elementals, fey, fiends, giants, monstrosities, oozes, plants, or undead. Alternatively, you can choose two races of humanoid (such as gnolls and orcs). You gain the following benefits:

items: During the first round of any combat against your chosen foes, your attack rolls against any of them have advantage.
When any of your chosen foes makes an opportunity attack against you, it makes the attack roll with disadvantage.

Whenever you make an Intelligence ({@skill Arcana}, {@skill History}, {@skill Nature}, or {@skill Religion}) check to recall information about your chosen foes, you add double your proficiency bonus to the check, even if you're not normally proficient.

feat.name: Human Determination
entries: You are filled with a determination that can draw the unreachable within your reach. You gain the following benefits:

items: When you make an attack roll, an ability check, or a saving throw, you can do so with advantage. Once you use this ability, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

feat.name: Infernal Constitution
entries: Fiendish blood runs strong in you. You gain the following benefits:

items: You have resistance to cold and poison damage.
You have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition poisoned}.

feat.name: Orcish Aggression
entries: As a bonus action, you can move up to your speed toward an enemy of your choice that you can see or hear. You must end this move closer to the enemy than you started.

feat.name: Orcish Fury
entries: Your fury burns tirelessly. You gain the following benefits:

items: When you hit with an attack made with a simple or martial weapon, you can roll one of the weapon's damage dice an additional time and add it as extra damage of the weapon's damage type. Once you use this ability, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.
Immediately after you use your Relentless Endurance trait, you can use your reaction to make one weapon attack.

feat.name: Prodigy
entries: You have a knack for learning new things. You gain the following benefits:

items: You gain one skill proficiency of your choice, one tool proficiency of your choice, and fluency in one language of your choice.

feat.name: Second Chance
entries: You have a knack for learning new things. You gain the following benefits:

items: When a creature you can see hits you with an attack roll, you can use your reaction to force that creature to reroll. Once you use this ability, you can't do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

feat.name: Squat Nimbleness
entries: You are uncommonly nimble for your race. You gain the following benefits:

items: Increase your walking speed by 5 feet.
You gain proficiency in the {@skill Acrobatics} or {@skill Athletics} skill. If you're already proficient in the skill, your proficiency bonus is doubled for any check you make with it.

feat.name: Wonder Maker
entries: You master the tinker techniques of your people. You gain the following benefits:

items: When you make a check using your proficiency with tinker's tools, you add double your proficiency bonus to the check.
When you make a device with your Tinker trait, you have the following additional options for what you make:

items.name: Alarm
entries: This device senses when a creature moves to within 15 feet of it without speaking aloud a password chosen when you create it. One round after a creature moves into range, the alarm makes a shrill ringing that lasts for 1 minute and can be heard from up to 300 feet away.

items.name: Calculator
entries: This device makes doing sums easy.

items.name: Lifter
entries: This device can be used as a block and tackle, allowing its user to hoist five times the weight the user can normally lift.

items.name: Timekeeper
entries: This pocket watch keeps accurate time.

items.name: Weather Sensor
entries: When used as an action, this device predicts weather conditions in a 1-mile radius over the next 4 hours, showing one symbol (clouds, sun/moon, rain, or snow) for each hour.

feat.name: Wood Elf Magic
entries: You learn the magic of the primeval woods. You learn one druid cantrip of your choice. You also learn {@spell longstrider} and {@spell pass without trace}, each of which you can cast once without expending a spell slot. You regain the ability to cast the spell in this way when you finish a long rest. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

feat.name: Acrobat
entries: You become more nimble, gaining the following benefits:

items: You gain proficiency in the {@skill Acrobatics} skill. If you are already proficient in the skill, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.
As a bonus action, you can make a DC 15 Dexterity ({@skill Acrobatics}) check. If you succeed, difficult terrain doesn't cost you extra movement until the end of the current turn.

feat.name: Animal Handler
entries: You master the techniques needed to train and handle animals. You gain the following benefits:

items: You gain proficiency in the {@skill Animal Handling} skill. If you are already proficient in the skill, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.

You can use a bonus action on your turn to command one friendly beast within 60 feet of you that can hear you and that isn't currently following the command of someone else. You decide now what action the beast will take and where it will move during its next turn, or you issue a general command that lasts for 1 minute, such as to guard a particular area.

feat.name: Arcanist
entries: You study the arcane arts, gaining the following benefits:

items: You gain proficiency in the {@skill Arcana} skill. If you are already proficient in the skill, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.

You learn the {@spell prestidigitation} and {@spell detect magic} spells. You can cast detect magic once without expending a spell slot, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest.

feat.name: Brawny
entries: You become stronger, gaining the following benefits:

items: You gain proficiency in the {@skill Athletics} skill. If you are already proficient in the skill, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.
You count as if you were one size larger for the purpose of determining your carrying capacity.

feat.name: Diplomat
entries: You master the arts of diplomacy, gaining the following benefits:

items: You gain proficiency in the {@skill Persuasion} skill. If you are already proficient in the skill, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.

If you spend 1 minute talking to someone who can understand what you say, you can make a Charisma ({@skill Persuasion}) check contested by the creature's Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) check. If you or your companions are fighting the creature, your check automatically fails. If your check succeeds, the target is {@condition charmed} by you as long as it remains within 60 feet of you and for 1 minute thereafter.

feat.name: Empathic
entries: You possess keen insight into how other people think and feel. You gain the following benefits:

items: You gain proficiency in the {@skill Insight} skill. If you are already proficient in the skill, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.

You can use your action to try to get uncanny insight about one humanoid you can see within 30 feet of you. Make a Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) check contested by the target's Charisma ({@skill Deception}) check. If your check succeeds, you have advantage on attack rolls and ability checks against the target until the end of your next turn.

feat.name: Historian
entries: Your study of history rewards you with the following benefits:

items: You gain proficiency in the {@skill History} skill. If you are already proficient in the skill, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.

When you take the Help action to aid another creature's ability check, you can make a DC 15 Intelligence ({@skill History}) check. On a success, that creature's check gains a bonus equal to your proficiency bonus, as you share pertinent advice and historical examples. To receive this bonus, the creature must be able to understand what you're saying.

feat.name: Investigator
entries: You have an eye for detail and can pick out the smallest clues. You gain the following benefits:

items: You gain proficiency in the {@skill Investigation} skill. If you are already proficient in the skill, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.
You can take the Search action as a bonus action.

feat.name: Medic
entries: You master the physician's arts, gaining the following benefits:

items: You gain proficiency in the {@skill Medicine} skill. If you are already proficient in the skill, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.

During a short rest, you can clean and bind the wounds of up to six willing beasts and humanoids. Make a DC 15 Wisdom ({@skill Medicine}) check for each creature. On a success, if a creature spends a Hit Die during this rest, that creature can forgo the roll and instead regain the maximum number of hit points the die can restore. A creature can do so only once per rest, regardless of how many Hit Dice it spends.

feat.name: Menacing
entries: You become fearsome to others, gaining the following benefits:

items: You gain proficiency in the {@skill Intimidation} skill. If you are already proficient in the skill, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.

When you take the Attack action on your turn, you can replace one attack with an attempt to demoralize one humanoid you can see within 30 feet of you that can see and hear you. Make a Charisma ({@skill Intimidation}) check contested by the target's Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) check. If your check succeeds, the target is {@condition frightened} until the end of your next turn. If your check fails, the target can't be {@condition frightened} by you in this way for 1 hour.

feat.name: Naturalist
entries: Your extensive study of nature rewards you with the following benefits:

items: You gain proficiency in the {@skill Nature} skill. If you are already proficient in the skill, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.

You learn the {@spell druidcraft} and {@spell detect poison and disease} spells. You can cast {@spell detect poison and disease} once without expending a spell slot, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest.

feat.name: Perceptive
entries: You hone your senses until they become razor sharp. You gain the following benefits:

items: You gain proficiency in the {@skill Perception} skill. If you are already proficient in the skill, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.
Being in a lightly obscured area doesn't impose disadvantage on your Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks if you can both see and hear.

feat.name: Performer
entries: You master performance so that you can command any stage. You gain the following benefits:

items: You gain proficiency in the {@skill Performance} skill. If you are already proficient in the skill, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.

While performing, you can try to distract one humanoid you can see who can see and hear you. Make a Charisma ({@skill Performance}) check contested by the humanoid's Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) check. If your check succeeds, you grab the humanoid's attention enough that it makes Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) and Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) checks with disadvantage until you stop performing.

feat.name: Quick-Fingered
entries: Your nimble fingers and agility let you perform sleight of hand. You gain the following benefits:

items: You gain proficiency in the {@skill Sleight of Hand} skill. If you are already proficient in the skill, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.
As a bonus action, you can make a Dexterity ({@skill Sleight of Hand}) check to plant something on someone else, conceal an object on a creature, lift a purse, or take something from a pocket.

feat.name: Silver-Tongued
entries: You develop your conversational skill to better deceive others. You gain the following benefits:

items: You gain proficiency in the {@skill Deception} skill. If you are already proficient in the skill, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.

When you take the Attack action on your turn, you can replace one attack with an attempt to deceive one humanoid you can see within 30 feet of you that can see and hear you. Make a Charisma ({@skill Deception}) check contested by the target's Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) check. If your check succeeds, your movement doesn't provoke opportunity attacks from the target and your attack rolls against it have advantage; both benefits last until the end of your next turn or until you use this ability on a different target. If your check fails, the target can't be deceived by you in this way for 1 hour.

feat.name: Stealthy
entries: You know how best to hide. You gain the following benefits:

items: You gain proficiency in the {@skill Stealth} skill. If you are already proficient in the skill, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.
If you are hidden, you can move up to 10 feet in the open without revealing yourself if you end the move in a position where you're not clearly visible.

feat.name: Survivalist
entries: You master wilderness lore, gaining the following benefits:

items: You gain proficiency in the {@skill Survival} skill. If you are already proficient in the skill, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.
You learn the {@spell alarm} spell. You can cast it once without expending a spell slot, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest.

feat.name: Theologian
entries: Your extensive study of religion rewards you with the following benefits:

items: You gain proficiency in the {@skill Religion} skill. If you are already proficient in the skill, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.

You learn the {@spell thaumaturgy} and {@spell detect evil and good} spells. You can cast {@spell detect evil and good} once without expending a spell slot, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest.

feat.name: Blade Mastery
entries: You master the shortsword, longsword, scimitar, rapier, and greatsword. You gain the following benefits when using any of them:

items: You gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls you make with the weapon.

On your turn, you can use your reaction to assume a parrying stance, provided you have the weapon in hand. Doing so grants you a +1 bonus to your AC until the start of your next turn or until you're not holding the weapon.
When you make an opportunity attack with the weapon, you have advantage on the attack roll.

feat.name: Fell Handed
entries: You master the handaxe, battleaxe, greataxe, warhammer, and maul. You gain the following benefits when using any of them:

items: You gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls you make with the weapon.
Whenever you have advantage on a melee attack roll you make with the weapon and hit, you can knock the target {@condition prone} if the lower of the two d20 rolls would also hit the target.

Whenever you have disadvantage on a melee attack roll you make with the weapon, the target takes bludgeoning damage equal to your Strength modifier (minimum of 0) if the attack misses but the higher of the two d20 rolls would have hit.

If you use the Help action to aid an ally's melee attack while you're wielding the weapon, you knock the target's shield aside momentarily. In addition to the ally gaining advantage on the attack roll, the ally gains a +2 bonus to the roll if the target is using a shield.

feat.name: Flail Mastery
entries: The flail is a tricky weapon to use, but you have spent countless hours mastering it. You gain the following benefits:

items: You gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls you make with a flail.

As a bonus action on your turn, you can prepare yourself to extend your flail to sweep over targets' shields. Until the end of this turn, your attack rolls with a flail gain a +2 bonus against any target using a shield.
When you hit with an opportunity attack using a flail, the target must succeed on a Strength saving throw (DC 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Strength modifier) or be knocked {@condition prone}.

feat.name: Spear Mastery
entries: Though the spear is a simple weapon to learn, it rewards you for the time you have taken to master it. You gain the following benefits:

items: You gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls you make with a spear.

When you use a spear, its damage die changes from a d6 to a d8, and from a d8 to a d10 when wielded with two hands. (This benefit has no effect if another feature has already improved the weapon's die.)

You can set your spear to receive a charge. As a bonus action, choose a creature you can see that is at least 20 feet away from you. If that creature moves within your spear's reach on its next turn, you can make a melee attack against it with your spear as a reaction. If the attack hits, the target takes an extra 1d8 piercing damage, or an extra 1d10 piercing damage if you wield the spear with two hands. You can't use this ability if the creature used the Disengage action before moving.
As a bonus action on your turn, you can increase your reach with a spear by 5 feet for the rest of your turn.

feat.name: Alchemist
entries: You have studied the secrets of alchemy and are an expert in its practice, gaining the following benefits:

items: You gain proficiency with alchemist's supplies. If you are already proficient with them, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with them.
As an action, you can identify one potion within 5 feet of you, as if you had tasted it. You must see the liquid for this benefit to work.

Over the course of any short rest, you can temporarily improve the potency of one potion of healing of any rarity. To use this benefit, you must have alchemist's supplies with you, and the potion must be within reach. If the potion is drunk no more than 1 hour after the short rest ends, the creature drinking the potion can forgo the potion's die roll and regains the maximum number of hit points that the potion can restore.

feat.name: Burglar
entries: You pride yourself on your quickness and your close study of certain clandestine activities. You gain the following benefits:

items: You gain proficiency with thieves' tools. If you are already proficient with them, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with them.

feat.name: Gourmand
entries: You have mastered a variety of special recipes, allowing you to prepare exotic dishes with useful effects. You gain the following benefits:

items: You gain proficiency with cook's utensils. If you are already proficient with them, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with them.
As an action, you can inspect a drink or plate of food within 5 feet of you and determine whether it is {@condition poisoned}, provided that you can see and smell it.

During a long rest, you can prepare and serve a meal that helps you and your allies recover from the rigors of adventuring, provided you have suitable food, cook's utensils, and other supplies on hand. The meal serves up to six people, and each person who eats it regains two additional Hit Dice at the end of the long rest. In addition, those who partake of the meal have advantage on Constitution saving throws against disease for the next 24 hours.

feat.name: Master of Disguise
entries: You have honed your ability to shape your personality and to read the personalities of others. You gain the following benefits:

items: You gain proficiency with the disguise kit. If you are already proficient with it, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.

If you spend 1 hour observing a creature, you can then spend 8 hours crafting a disguise you can quickly don to mimic that creature. Making the disguise requires a disguise kit. You must make checks as normal to disguise yourself, but you can assume the disguise as an action.

feat.name: 演員[Actor]
entries: 精通于模仿和演戲，讓你獲得下列好處：

items: 當你試圖將自己扮演成另一個人時，你的魅力（欺瞞）和魅力（表演）檢定獲得優勢。
你可以模仿另外一個生物的說話口吻和聲音。你必須聽過被模仿者說話或發聲至少１分鐘。聆聽你模仿的單位可以進行感知（洞察）檢定對抗你的魅力（欺瞞）檢定，成功則會發現聲音是模仿出來的。

feat.name: 警覺[Alert]
entries: 經常對危機保持警惕，讓你獲得下列好處：

items: 你的先攻獲得＋５加值。
當你意識清醒時無法被突襲。
你看不見的生物對你進行的攻擊骰不會得到優勢。

feat.name: 運動健將[Athlete]
entries: 你經歷的廣泛肉體訓練讓你獲得下列好處：

items: 你的力量或敏捷增加１點，上限２０。
當你{@condition 倒地[prone]}時，你起立所需要花費的移動力為５尺。
攀爬無需減半速度。
你只需要移動５尺就可以進行跳高和跳遠，而非移動１０尺。

feat.name: 衝鋒手[Charger]
entries: 當你用動作疾走時，你可以用附贈動作進行一次近戰武器攻擊或推撞一個生物。
若你在使用附贈動作前至少直線行走１０尺，該次攻擊的傷害得到＋５加值（若你選擇近戰攻擊且命中）或目標被推撞最多１０尺（若你選擇推撞且成功）。

feat.name: 強弩專家[Crossbow Expert]
entries: 感謝你在弩上的一系列修行吧，你獲得下列好處：

items: 你忽略你所熟練的弩上面的裝填武器屬性。
不會因在敵對生物５尺內進行遠程攻擊而得到劣勢。
當你使用攻擊動作且用單手武器攻擊后，你可以用附贈動作使用一把已裝填且已持握的手弩進行攻擊。

feat.name: 防禦式決鬥[Defensive Duelist]
entries: 當你持握一把熟練的靈巧武器時，另一生物近戰擊中了你，你可以用反應將你的熟練加值添加到該次攻擊的ＡＣ上，此舉有可能讓攻擊丟失。

feat.name: Dragonmark of Detection
entries: Your have the magical mark of Detection, the dragonmark of House Medani, and are a member of that house.

You gain the ability to innately cast spells and cantrips, using Wisdom as your spellcasting ability. You cast each spell at its lowest level. Once you cast a given spell this way, you must finish a long rest before you can cast it innately again. You must still expend any material components. Your dragonmark confers the following benefits:

entries.name: Least Dragonmark
entries: When you first take this feat, you gain the least dragonmark. You learn the following spells: {@spell detect magic}, {@spell mage hand}

entries.name: Lesser Dragonmark
entries: At 5th level and higher, your mark becomes more potent, improving to lesser dragonmark. You learn the following spell: {@spell detect thoughts}

entries.name: Greater Dragonmark
entries: At 9th level and higher, your mark's power increases again, becoming a greater dragonmark. You learn the following spell: {@spell clairvoyance}

feat.name: Dragonmark of Finding
entries: Your have the magical mark of Finding, the dragonmark of House Tharashk, and are a member of that house.

You gain the ability to innately cast spells and cantrips, using Wisdom as your spellcasting ability. You cast each spell at its lowest level. Once you cast a given spell this way, you must finish a long rest before you can cast it innately again. You must still expend any material components. Your dragonmark confers the following benefits:

entries.name: Least Dragonmark
entries: When you first take this feat, you gain the least dragonmark. You learn the following spells: {@spell identify}, {@spell mage hand}

entries.name: Lesser Dragonmark
entries: At 5th level and higher, your mark becomes more potent, improving to lesser dragonmark. You learn the following spell: {@spell locate object}

entries.name: Greater Dragonmark
entries: At 9th level and higher, your mark's power increases again, becoming a greater dragonmark. You learn the following spell: {@spell clairvoyance}

feat.name: Dragonmark of Handling
entries: Your have the magical mark of Handling, the dragonmark of House Vadalis, and are a member of that house.

You gain the ability to innately cast spells and cantrips, using Wisdom as your spellcasting ability. You cast each spell at its lowest level. Once you cast a given spell this way, you must finish a long rest before you can cast it innately again. You must still expend any material components. Your dragonmark confers the following benefits:

entries.name: Least Dragonmark
entries: When you first take this feat, you gain the least dragonmark. You learn the following spells: {@spell druidcraft}, {@spell speak with animals}

entries.name: Lesser Dragonmark
entries: At 5th level and higher, your mark becomes more potent, improving to lesser dragonmark. You learn the following spell: {@spell beast sense}

entries.name: Greater Dragonmark
entries: At 9th level and higher, your mark's power increases again, becoming a greater dragonmark. You learn the following spell: {@spell conjure animals}

feat.name: 雙持客[Dual Wielder]
entries: 你超擅長雙持作戰，得到下列好處：

items: 當你兩手各使用１把武器時，你的ＡＣ得到＋１加值。
你可以使用非輕型單手武器進行雙持武器戰鬥。
你可以在正常只能拔出或入鞘１把武器時，同時拔出或入鞘２把單手武器。

feat.name: 地城探索者[Dungeon Delver]
entries: 對於地城中的隱藏陷阱和密門你十分敏銳，你獲得下列好處：

items: 你在搜尋密門時的感知（觀察）和智力（調查）檢定獲得優勢。
你在躲避或抵抗陷阱時的豁免骰上有優勢。
你對所有陷阱造成的傷害有抗力。

feat.name: 耐性[Durable]
entries: 堅強而持久，這就是你的好處：

items: 你的體魄加１，上限２０。
當你骰生命骰來恢復生命值時，每顆生命骰可以恢復的最小生命值等於你體魄調整值的兩倍（最小為２）。

feat.name: 元素導師[Elemental Adept]
entries: 獲得該專長時，你選擇下列一種傷害類型：強酸(acid)、冷凍(cold)、火焰(fire)、閃電(lightning)、雷鳴(thunder)。
你所釋放的法術忽視你所選擇傷害類型的抗力。額外的，當你釋放法術造成所選類型的傷害時，將骰出的所有１視為２。
你可以選擇該專長多次，每次都必須選擇一種不同的傷害類型。

feat.name: 擒抱者[Grappler]
entries: 你著重磨練了如何保持近距離擒抱的技巧。你獲得下列好處：

items: 你對被你擒抱的生物的攻擊骰有優勢。
你可以用動作嘗試壓制{@condition 被擒[Grappled]}的單位。若如此做，進行另外一個擒抱檢定。若成功，你與被擒者同時進入{@condition restrained}狀態，直到擒抱終止。

feat.name: 巨武大師[Great Weapon Master]
entries: 你習得將武器重量作為優勢的技巧，使得你的攻擊力大增。你獲得下列好處：

items: 在你的回合，當你用近戰武器造成重擊或將一名生物生命值降低至０，你可以用附贈動作進行１次近戰武器攻擊。
當你在使用熟練的重型武器進行近戰攻擊前，你可以選擇該次攻擊承受－５罰值。若該次攻擊命中，該次傷害得到＋１０加值。

feat.name: 治愈師[Healer]
entries: 你是嫻熟的醫師，可以快速治療傷口，讓戰友迅速重返戰鬥。你獲得下列好處：

items: 當你用治療工具[healer's kit]穩定生物傷勢時，該生物可以恢復１點生命值。
以一個動作，你可以消耗１個醫療包照顧一個生物並治療他 {@dice 1d6+4} + 生命骰的最大數量。這個生物在進行小休或長休前無法再次從該專長獲取生命值。

feat.name: 重甲運用[Heavily Armored]
entries: 你學習了重甲的使用方法，你獲得下列好處：

items: 你的力量加１，上限２０。
你熟練重甲。

feat.name: 重甲大師[Heavy Armor Master]
entries: 你可以用護甲偏斜大多數致命的攻擊。你獲得下列好處：

items: 你的力量加１，上限２０。
當你穿重甲時，非魔法武器對你造成的鈍擊[bludgeoning]、穿刺[piercing]、揮砍[slashing]傷害降低３點。

feat.name: 領袖之證[Inspiring Leader]
entries: 你可以花費１０分鐘來激勵你的同伴，鼓舞他們對戰鬥的信心。若你如此做，選擇３０尺內可以看到或聽到你且理解你的最多６個友善生物（可以包括你自己），所選生物可以獲得臨時生命值，等於你的等級加上你的魅力調整值。在經過小休或長休之前，生物無法從該專長獲益１次以上。

feat.name: 敏銳心靈[Keen Mind]
entries: 你擁有一顆可以追尋時間、方位，并擁有強烈精確度的心靈。你獲得下列好處：

items: 你的智力加１，上限２０。
你始終知道北邊的方位。
你始終知道距離下一次日出或日落還有多久。
你可以完美複述出一個月內你聽到或看到的一切。

feat.name: 輕甲運用[Lightly Armored]
entries: 你學習了輕甲的使用方法，獲得下列好處：

items: 你的力量或敏捷加１，上限２０。
你熟練輕甲。

feat.name: 語言學家[Linguist]
entries: 你學習了不少語言和密碼，獲得下列好處：

items: 你的智力加１，上限２０。
你學得３個自選語言。
你可以自創密碼。未經你傳授密碼解法的人只有兩種方法可以破譯你的密碼：一是進行智力檢定（ＤＣ＝你的智力值＋你熟練加值），二是魔法破譯。

feat.name: 幸運[Lucky]
entries: 你的離奇運氣讓你可以在最危險的時刻化險為夷。
你獲得３點幸運點。當你骰攻擊骰、屬性檢定、豁免骰時，你可以花費１點幸運點再骰１個 {@dice d20} 。你可以選擇在正常骰出現之後再花費幸運點骰 {@dice d20} ，但必須在結果決定之前。你可以選擇該次攻擊骰、屬性檢定、豁免骰使用哪顆Ｄ２０。
你也可以在被攻擊時選擇花費１點幸運點骰１個Ｄ２０。然後由你決定攻擊你的人使用哪顆Ｄ２０，他的或你的。若不止一個生物決定花費幸運點影響同一個骰子，幸運點互相抵消；不會有額外的Ｄ２０被骰出。
經過長休你可以恢復你所有的幸運點。

feat.name: 巫師殺手[Mage Slayer]
entries: 你擁有一套對付施法者的近身戰法，獲得下列好處：

items: 當一名處於你５尺範圍內的生物施法時，你可以用你的反應對該生物進行一次近戰武器攻擊。
當你傷害了一名正專注法術的生物，該生物在維持專注的豁免中獲得劣勢。
對於在你５尺範圍內的生物對你施展的法術，你的豁免獲得優勢。

feat.name: 魔法學徒[Magic Initiate]
entries: 選擇一個職業： 吟遊詩人[{@filter bard|spells|level=0;1|class=bard}]、牧師[{@filter cleric|spells|level=0;1|class=cleric}]、德魯伊[{@filter druid|spells|level=0;1|class=druid}]、術士[{@filter sorcerer|spells|level=0;1|class=sorcerer}]、魔導師[{@filter warlock|spells|level=0;1|class=warlock}]、法師[{@filter wizard|spells|level=0;1|class=wizard}]你從所選職業法術列表里習得２個戲法。
額外的，從相同列表里選擇１個１環法術。你習得該法術，可以用最低環法術位來施放它。施放過該法術後，只有經過長休才能再次施放。
這些法術的施法屬性取決於你所選的職業：吟遊詩人、術士、魔導師用魅力；牧師、德魯伊用感知；法師用智力。

feat.name: 戰技專家[Martial Adept]
entries: 你經歷過戰技訓練，因此可以使用一些獨特戰技。你獲得下列好處：

items: 你從戰士變體戰鬥大師[{@class fighter|phb|Battle Master|Battle Master|phb|Martial Archetype 3}]的戰技列表中選擇２個戰技學習。若習得戰技需要目標進行豁免檢定來抵抗戰技效果，豁免ＤＣ＝８＋你的熟練加值＋你的力量或敏捷調整值（自選）。
若你有卓越骰，則你增加一骰；若没有，則你獲得一个ｄ６卓越骰。此卓越骰可用於啟動你的戰技。此卓越骰一經使用即消耗，在短休息或長休息之後恢復。

feat.name: 中甲大師[Medium Armor Master]
entries: 你修習過如何穿中甲移動，獲得下列好處：

items: 穿中甲不會讓你的敏捷（隱匿）檢定獲得劣勢。
當你穿中甲時，若你的敏捷在１６或以上，你的ＡＣ可以增加３點而非２點。

feat.name: 靈活移動[Mobile]
entries: 你十分靈敏而快速。獲得下列好處：

items: 你的移動速度增加１０尺。
當你使用疾走動作時，本回合內困難地形不會消耗額外移動力。
當你對一個生物進行近戰攻擊後，無論命中與否，本回合剩下時間內你不會引發該生物的藉機攻擊。

feat.name: 中甲運用[Moderately Armored]
entries: 你習得如何使用中甲和盾牌，獲得下列好處：

items: 你的力量或敏捷加１，上限２０。
你熟練中甲和盾牌。

feat.name: 騎乘戰鬥[Mounted Combatant]
entries: 騎乘中的你就像一頭怪獸，當你騎乘且未{@condition 乏力[Incapacitated]}時，你獲得下列好處：

items: 騎乘時，攻擊比你坐騎小的未騎乘生物時，你的近戰攻擊骰獲得優勢。
你可以強制針對你坐騎的攻擊轉而針對你自己。
若你的坐騎受到需要進行敏捷豁免來減半傷害的效果影響，則豁免成功可以不承受傷害，豁免失敗也只承受一半傷害。

feat.name: 觀察力[Observant]
entries: 你能夠迅速把握周遭環境的要點，獲得下列好處：

items: 你的智力或感知加１，上限２０。
若你可以看見目標的嘴正在講話且你理解該語言，你就可以依靠讀唇理解目標正在講什麼。
你的被動感知（觀察）和被動智力（調查）檢定獲得＋５加值。

feat.name: 長武大師[Polearm Master]
entries: 你可以用觸及武器[reach weapons]與敵人近身纏鬥。獲得下列好處：

items: 當你用攻擊動作且只使用大刀[glaive]、槍斧[halberd]或長棍[quarterstaff]攻擊，你可以用附贈動作使用武器的柄進行一次近戰攻擊。這次攻擊的傷害骰是 {@dice d4} ，造成鈍擊[bludgeoning]傷害。
當你持握大刀[glaive]、槍斧[halberd]、長矛[pick]或長棍[quarterstaff]時，進入你觸及範圍的生物可以引發你的藉機攻擊。

feat.name: 強健身心[Resilient]
entries: 選擇１種屬性，獲得下列好處：

items: 所選屬性加１，上限２０。
你所選屬性的豁免獲得熟練加值。

feat.name: 儀式施法者[Ritual Caster]
entries: 你習得一些可以用儀式施放的法術。這些法術會記載在儀式書上，你在用儀式方式施放它們時必須將儀式書鋪在手上。

當你選擇該專長時，你獲得１本記載了２個自選１環法術的儀式書。選擇下列一個職業：吟遊詩人[{@filter bard|spells|level=1|class=bard|components & miscellaneous=ritual}]、牧師[{@filter cleric|spells|level=1|class=cleric|components & miscellaneous=ritual}]、德魯伊[{@filter druid|spells|level=1|class=druid|components & miscellaneous=ritual}]、術士{@filter sorcerer|spells|level=1|class=sorcerer|components & miscellaneous=ritual}、魔導師{@filter warlock|spells|level=1|class=warlock|components & miscellaneous=ritual}或法師{@filter wizard|spells|level=1|class=wizard|components & miscellaneous=ritual}。你所選法術必須在所選職業的法術列表里，且所選法術必須有儀式標記。你所選的職業同樣決定了這些法術的施法屬性：吟遊詩人、術士、魔導師用魅力；牧師、德魯伊用感知；法師用智力。
若你獲得了一種法術的書寫形式，比如魔法捲軸或法師的法術書，你可以將它添加進你的儀式書里。被添加的法術必須在你所選職業的法術列表里，且該法術環數不能高於你等級的一半（向上取整），該法術必須有儀式標記。將該法術抄進你的儀式書消耗每環２小時和５０ｇｐ。這個消耗表現為你研究掌握該法術消耗的材料構材和抄寫進儀式書所用的優質墨水等等。

feat.name: 野蠻攻擊[Savage Attacker]
entries: 每回合一次當你骰近戰武器的傷害骰時，你可以重骰「武器」的傷害骰並選用二者之一。

feat.name: 哨兵[Sentinel]
entries: 你的武鬥技術讓你在擊破敵人防禦時佔盡優勢，獲得下列好處：

items: 當你的藉機攻擊命中目標時，目標在本回合剩下時間內的移動速度降低至０。
處於你５尺範圍內的生物即便使用撤退動作離開你的觸及，也會引發你的藉機攻擊。
若處於你５尺範圍內的生物對非你單位進行攻擊（且被攻擊者沒有這個專長），你可以用你的反應對攻擊者進行一次近戰攻擊。

feat.name: 神射手[Sharpshooter]
entries: 你是遠程武器的大師，看似不可能的射擊都可以達成。獲得下列好處：

items: 攻擊遠射程中的敵人不會在遠武器攻擊骰上獲得劣勢。(注：5呎內目標仍有劣勢)
你的遠程武器攻擊忽視半掩蔽和四分之三掩蔽。
在你用熟練的遠程武器進行攻擊之前，你可以選擇該次攻擊承受－５罰值。若命中，傷害獲得＋１０加值。

feat.name: 盾牌大師[Shield Master]
entries: 你的盾牌不是只用來防禦的玩具。當你持用盾牌時獲得下列好處：

items: 在你的回合內若你使用攻擊動作，你可以用附贈動作通過盾牌推撞１個5呎內的生物。
你未{@condition 乏力[Incapacitated]}時你可以將你的盾牌ＡＣ添加到只影響你的法術或效果的敏捷豁免骰中。
若你可以通過成功的敏捷豁免骰來使受到的傷害減半，你可以用你的反應使豁免成功后不受到傷害，顯示為將盾牌擋在你和效果點中間。

feat.name: 多才多藝[Skilled]
entries: 選擇３個技能或工具，你熟練使用它們。

feat.name: 潛行者[Skulker]
entries: 你是藏匿於影中的專家，獲得下列好處：

items: 你可以在輕度掩蔽[lightly obscured]的狀態下嘗試躲藏。
當你對某生物處於隱匿狀態時，對他的遠程武器攻擊失手不會暴露你的方位。
微光[Dim light]不會給你依靠視覺的感知（觀察）檢定劣勢。

feat.name: 法術射手[Spell Sniper]
entries: 你習得如何操控特定法術進行攻擊，獲得下列好處：

items: 當你施放的法術需要進行攻擊骰時，該法術射程加倍。
你的遠程法術攻擊骰忽視半掩蔽和四分之三掩蔽。

你習得一個需要攻擊骰的戲法。從吟遊詩人[{@filter bard|spells|level=0|class=bard}]、牧師[{@filter cleric|spells|level=0|class=cleric}]、德魯伊[{@filter druid|spells|level=0|class=druid}]、術士[{@filter sorcerer|spells|level=0|class=sorcerer}]、魔導師[{@filter warlock|spells|level=0|class=warlock}]、法師[{@filter wizard|spells|level=0|class=wizard}]列表里選擇該戲法。你施展該戲法的施法屬性取決於你選擇的職業列表：吟遊詩人、術士、魔導師用魅力；牧師、德魯伊用感知；法師用智力。

feat.name: Svirfneblin Magic
entries: You have inherited the innate spellcasting ability of your ancestors. This ability allows you to cast {@spell nondetection} on yourself at will, without needing a material component. You can also cast each of the following spells once with this ability: {@spell blindness/deafness}, {@spell blur}, and {@spell disguise self}. You regain the ability to cast these spells when you finish a long rest.
Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for these spells, and you cast them at their lowest possible levels.

feat.name: 鬥毆高手[Tavern Brawler]
entries: 你最喜歡粗暴而混亂的肉體鬥毆了，管它手上握著的是什麼呢。獲得下列好處：

items: 你的力量或體魄加１，上限２０。
你熟練與臨時武器和徒手攻擊。
你的徒手攻擊傷害骰變為 {@dice d4} 。
在你的回合內若你用徒手攻擊或臨時武器命中敵人，你可以用附贈動作對該敵人進行一次嘗試使敵人{@condition 被擒[Grappled]}。

feat.name: 健壯[Tough]
entries: 獲得該專長時，你的生命值上限增加２倍你當前等級的數值。之後你每次獲得等級，你的生命值上限都會額外加２。

feat.name: 戰鬥施法者[War Caster]
entries: 你學習過如果在混沌的戰場上施放法術，獲得下列好處：

items: 當你受到傷害時，你在保持法術專注的體魄豁免上獲得優勢。
你可以在單手或雙手持握武器和盾牌時依舊滿足施法所需的姿勢構材。
當敵方生物的移動引發你的藉機攻擊時，你可以用你的反應對該生物施放一個法術而非進行一次藉機攻擊。這個法術的施法時間必須是一個動作，目標只能限定為該生物。

feat.name: 武器大師[Weapon Master]
entries: 武器在你手中就如同玩具一般簡單，獲得下列好處：

items: 你的力量或敏捷加１，上限２０。
你熟練４種自選你所選的，簡易或軍用武器。

feat.name: Quicksmithing
entries: You have mastered the art of on-the-fly invention, improvement, and jury-rigging. You can use your talents to create immediate, short-term magical effects similar to spells, given time and an adequate supply of aether.

When you choose this feat, you master two magical effects, each of which recreates the effect of a 1st-level spell that has the ritual tag. These spells can come from any class list, but Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for them.

If you come across a schematic geared toward quicksmithing or study with another quicksmith, you might be able to add another spell to the effects you have mastered. The spell's level can be no higher than half your level (rounded up), and it must have the ritual tag. The process of mastering the spell takes 2 hours per level of the spell, and costs 50 gp per level. The cost represents aether you use as you experiment with the spell effect to master it.

In addition, you have proficiency with artisan's tools (quicksmith's tools). Using those tools, you can spend 1 hour and 10 gp worth of materials to construct a Tiny clockwork device (AC 5, 1 hp). The device ceases to function after 24 hours unless you spend 1 hour repairing it to keep it functioning. You can use your action to dismantle the device, at which point you can reclaim the materials used to create it. You can have up to three such devices active at a time.
When you create a device, choose one of the following options:

entries.name: Clockwork Toy
entries: This toy is a clockwork animal, monster, or person, such as a frog, mouse, bird, dragon, or soldier. When placed on the ground, the toy moves 5 feet across the ground on each of your turns in a random direction. It makes noises as appropriate to the creature it represents.

entries.name: Fire Starter
entries: This device produces a miniature flame, which you can use to light a candle, torch, or campfire. Using the device requires your action.

entries.name: Music Box
entries: When opened, this music box plays a single song at a moderate volume. The box stops playing when it reaches the song's end or when it is closed.

feat.name: Servo Crafting
entries: You are skilled in the creation of servos—tiny constructs that function as personal assistants. You can cast the find familiar spell as a ritual, creating a servo to serve as your familiar instead of an animal. A servo's statistics appear in the "Artifact Creatures" section of this document. In every other way, a servo familiar functions as described in the find familiar spell.
You can communicate telepathically with your servo familiar and perceive through its senses as long as you are on the same plane of existence. You can speak through your servo in your own voice.
Additionally, when you take the Attack action, you can forgo one of your own attacks to allow your servo familiar to make one attack of its own.

feat.name: 慷慨吉運[Bountiful Luck]
entries: 你的民族有著非同尋常的好運，且你學過如何在看到同伴難堪之時將其秘密地借給他們。你也不知道你是怎麽做到的。你只是想想，那就實現了，這是命運的贈禮！
如果一個三十尺內你可以看見的隊友在攻擊骰，技能檢定或者豁免上扔了個1，你可以以一個反應讓他重扔一次，隊友必須接受新的結果。
當你使用這個能力，直到下回合結束你都不能再次使用。

feat.name: 龍族恐怖[Dragon Fear]
entries: 氣憤之時，你展露威懾之力。你獲得以下好處：

items: 力量，體質或者魅力+1，不能超過20。
你可以使用咆哮並消耗你的噴吐武器使三十尺內你選擇的每個生物通過一個感知豁免檢定（DC＝8+你的熟練加值+魅力調整值）取代噴射毀滅性能量。聽不到或看不到你的目標單位自動通過此檢定。如果豁免失敗，目標{@condition 恐慌[Frightened]}一分鐘。如果{@condition 恐慌[Frightened]}的目標受到任何傷害，他可以重投豁免檢定，直到通過為止。

feat.name: 龍族皮膚[Dragon Hide]
entries: 你顯出自你龍族先祖的利爪與鱗片，你獲得以下好處：

items: 你的力量，體質或者魅力+1，不能超過20。
你的皮膚硬化，如果你沒穿盔甲則你的AC變為13+敏捷調整值。你可以在持握盾牌時仍獲得此好處。
你的指尖長出可伸縮的利爪，伸出或縮回爪子不消耗動作，爪子是可以用來徒手打擊的天生武器，如果你用他們發動攻擊，你造成 {@dice 1d4} +你的力量調整值的揮砍(slashing)傷害，以代替正常徒手打擊造成的鈍擊(bludgeoning)傷害。

feat.name: 高等卓爾魔法[Drow High Magic]
entries: 你學到了更多種類的黑暗精靈魔法。你學會{@spell 偵察魔法[Detect Magic]}並可以任意釋放他，而不會消耗法術位。你學會{@spell 浮空[Levitate]}和{@spell 解除魔法[Dispel Magic]}，你可以釋放每種一次不消耗法術位。直到你完成一次長休息你才可以再度釋放他們。魅力是你施放這三個法術的施法主屬性。

feat.name: 矮人堅毅[Dwarven Fortitude]
entries: 你的血脈中流淌著矮人英雄的血液。你獲得以下好處：

items: 你的體質+1，最大20。
當你在戰鬥中使用回避動作時，你可以消耗一顆生命骰來治愈自己。扔一顆骰子，加上你的體質調整值，恢復相同的生命（最少為1）。

feat.name: 精靈之準[Elven Accuracy]
entries: 精靈之準是一種傳說，尤其以弓箭手和施法者為甚，你在依賴精確度而非蠻力的攻擊檢定上有著奇妙的準頭，你獲得以下好處：

items: 你的敏捷，智力，感知或魅力+1，最大20。
當你在依靠敏捷，智力，感知或者魅力進行的攻擊骰上有優勢的時候，你可以重扔其中一個骰子。

feat.name: 逐漸消失[Fade Away]
entries: 你的族人在幻術系魔法的技巧上很有天賦。你學過一種在你受到傷害時逐漸隱去的魔法技巧。你獲得以下好處：

items: 你的敏捷或智力+1，最大20。
當你受到傷害，你可以用一個反應來用魔法把自己變成隱形，直到你攻擊，造成傷害或使別人通過豁免檢定或者下個回合。你只能使用一次這個能力，直到你進行一次短休息或者長休息。

feat.name: 精類位移[Fey Teleportation]
entries: 你的高等精靈學識研究已然解鎖了一些其他精靈掌控的精類力量，而非你的艾拉德林表親。利用你的精類先祖，你可以大步邁入妖精荒野來減短你從一個地方到另一個地方的道路，你獲得以下好處：

items: 你的智力或者魅力+1，最大20。
你學會說讀寫木族語[Sylvan]。
你學會了{@spell 迷霧步[Misty Step]}並且可以不消耗法術位釋放他。直到你進行一次短休息或者長休息你才能再度使用此能力。智力是你的施法主屬性。

feat.name: 弗萊格索斯之焰[Flames of Phlegethos]
entries: 你學會了召喚地獄火來聽從你的指揮，你獲得以下好處：

items: 智力或者魅力+1，最大20。
當你施展法術扔火焰傷害的傷害骰時，你可以重扔任何被扔到 1 的骰子，你必須接受新結果哪怕那也只是個 1。
當你施展造成火焰傷害的法術時，你可以讓火焰環繞於你，直到你的下個回合結束。那些火焰不會對你或者你的物品造成傷害。他們提供30尺明亮照明和額外30尺昏暗照明，只要處於火焰現形之時，任何在你五尺內對你近戰攻擊的生物都會受到 {@dice 1d4} 火焰傷害。

feat.name: 惡魔體質[Infernal Constitution]
entries: 惡魔之血支撐著你，解鎖一些類似惡魔領主擁有的韌性。你獲得以下好處：

items: 體質+1，不能超過20。
你獲得對寒冷[cold]與毒性[poison]的抗性。
你在對抗{@condition 中毒[Poisoned]}時有優勢。

feat.name: 獸人式狂怒[Orcish Fury]
entries: 你的狂怒爆發時不知疲倦，你獲得以下好處：

items: 力量或者體質+1，最高20。
當你用簡易或者軍用武器進行一次攻擊命中時，你可以再扔一個武器傷害骰並且用武器傷害同樣的傷害類型將它加入額外傷害。你只能使用一次，直到你進行一次短休息或者長休息。
在你進行堅韌不屈特性之後，你可以立即以反應進行一次武器攻擊。

feat.name: 奇才[Prodigy]
entries: 你擁有學習新鮮事物的本領，你獲得以下好處：

items: 你獲得一種自選技能的熟練，一種自選工具的熟練，且嫻熟於一種自選的語言。
選擇一種你已經熟練於其的技能。你獲得這種技能的專精，這意味著你在以其進行的任何技能檢定上獲得雙倍熟練值。你選擇的這個技能必須未在任何特性上獲得雙倍熟練的好處，例如專精。

feat.name: 二次機會[Second Chance]
entries: 命運在有人想要傷害你時眷顧於你，你獲得以下好處：

items: 敏捷，體質或者魅力+1，最大20。
當一個你可以看到的生物對你進行攻擊骰命中時，你可以用一個反應讓那個生物重骰。一旦你使用此能力，直到你進行一次短休息或者長休息你才能再度使用此能力。

feat.name: 低身之機敏[Squat Nimbleness]
entries: 你有這在你族群中不尋常的機敏，你獲得以下好處：

items: 你的力量或者敏捷+1，最大20。
你的速度提升5尺。
你獲得(運動)或者(特技動作)的熟練（由你選擇）。
你在進行的脫離{@condition 被擒[Grappled]}狀態的力量（運動）或者敏捷（特技動作）的檢定上獲得優勢。

feat.name: 木精靈魔法[Wood Elf Magic]
entries: 你學會由你的族人保護和尊敬的原初之木的魔法。你學會一種任選的德魯伊戲法，你同時學會{@spell 大步奔行[Longstrider]}和{@spell 行蹤無跡[Pass without Trace]}。你可以釋放他們各一次而不消耗法術位，直到一次長休息或者短休息，你才可以再次通過此能力施法。這三個法術的施法主屬性是感知。

feat.name: Vampiric Exultation
entries: As an action, you can transform the lower half of your body into an inky black vapor, allowing you to float through the air. While transformed, you have a flying speed of 30 feet. You can maintain this form for up to 10 minutes. Once you use this ability, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

feat.name: Revenant Blade
entries: You are descended from a master of the double blade and their skills have passed on to you. You gain the following benefits:

items: While wielding a double-bladed weapon with two hands, the weapon has the finesse trait for your attacks with it, and you gain +1 AC.
On your turn, when you use a bonus action to make a melee attack with the blade at the opposite end of the weapon, the weapon's damage die for this attack increases to 2d4, instead of 1d4.

feat.name: Greater Dragonmark (Detection)
entries: Your dragonmark has grown in size and power. This enhances your existing dragonmark, and the benefits are based on the mark that you already possess. A greater dragonmark provides the following benefits:

items: The die type of your dragonmarked Intuition Die increases by one (for example, from a d4 to a d6).

You learn the spells {@spell see invisibility} and {@spell true seeing}, each of which you can cast once without expending a spell slot or using a material component. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for these spells. Once you cast a spell using this feature, and you must finish a long rest before you can do so again.

feat.name: Greater Dragonmark (Warding)
entries: Your dragonmark has grown in size and power. This enhances your existing dragonmark, and the benefits are based on the mark that you already possess. A greater dragonmark provides the following benefits:

items: The die type of your dragonmarked Intuition Die increases by one (for example, from a d4 to a d6).

You learn the spells {@spell knock}, {@spell glyph of warding} and {@spell Leomund's secret chest}*, each of which you can cast once without expending a spell slot or using a material component. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for these spells. Once you cast a spell using this feature, and you must finish a long rest before you can do so again.

entries: * To cast {@spell Leomund's secret chest} using this feat, you must have a Siberys dragonshard with a value of at least 100 gp. While you have this dragonshard in hand, it serves as the spell's focus, and you can use it to summon and dismiss the chest.

feat.name: Aberrant Dragonmark
entries: You have manifested an aberrant dragonmark. Determine its appearance and the flaw associated with it (see the Aberrant Mark Flaw table for examples). You gain the following benefits:

items: You learn a {@filter cantrip from the sorcerer spell list|spells|level=0|class=Sorcerer}. In addition, choose a {@filter 1st-level spell from the sorcerer spell list|spells|level=1|class=Sorcerer}. You learn that spell and can cast it at its lowest level. Once you cast it, you must finish a long rest before you can cast it again. Constitution is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

You can increase the power of your aberrant spells at the risk of your own vitality. When you cast a spell with your aberrant mark, you can use one of your Hit Dice to increase the spell's level by 1. Immediately after you cast the spell, roll the Hit Die. You take damage equal to the number rolled.

entries.caption: Aberrant Mark Flaw
rows: Your mark is a source of constant physical pain.
Your mark whispers to you, though you may not understand what it says.
In times of stress, your mark may trigger a cantrip effect involuntarily.
The skin around your mark has an unusual appearance: burned, scaly, withered, etc.
Mundane animals become uneasy around you.
You have dramatic mood swings any time you use your mark.
Your appearance changes in a minor way every time you use your mark.
You have horrific nightmares after you use your mark.
